import React , {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import Header from "../components/Header"; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import { Formik , Form, input, inputArray, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Await, Link,useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const UploadDocuments = () => { const [image , setImage] = useState('') function handleImage(e) { console.log(e.target.files) setImage(e.target.files[0]) } function handleApi() { const formData = new FormData() formData.append('image', image) axios.post('https://rsacarbook.jaraware.com/api/v1/uploadUserDocument', formData ).then((res) => { console.log("res",res) }) } return ( <>
